item.title: Using GnuPGP for good and for a Project Manager IC level
item.description: This post is a practice on GnuPGP to add some security on sensitive information but a very basic level.

item.title: Securizing Org files with Org-crypt
item.description: 1Inspiration This comes from the need that I am using python in org-babel to integrate my PM workflow between org-mode and JIRA.
